posts.post_content:
**CARDS ARE SOLD**

7 card T206 raw lot for sale. A few are some extra's from a nice lot I recently picked up from Trae that were dupes for me with some others mixed in that have been recently upgraded. 
All cards are guaranteed to grade numerically by your choice of TPG. $147 delivered. Paypal A-Okay with no extra fee. Please drop me a PM or email if you like em. Thanks all, Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Doolan batting - vg to vg-ex / no creases 
Flanagan - vg to vg-ex / no creases
Lake (St Louis ball in hand) - vg / light chipping bottom border
Mcintyre - good+ / light creasing through his head and in name at bottom
Mcgann - good+ / both side borders have chipping
Seitz (Southern Leaguer) - good / crease in his face, penciled "x" indentation on reverse, slight ink rub on reverse
Unglaub - good / left corner crease, right border chipping

[IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/8-19commonsfronts.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/8-19commonsbacks.jpg[/IMG]
